# thecloud_subnet (Resource)

Subnet resource allows you to manage network subnets within a VPC.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cidr_block` (String) The CIDR block for the subnet.
- `name` (String) The name of the subnet.
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the VPC this subnet belongs to.

### Optional

- `availability_zone` (String) The availability zone for the subnet.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the subnet.
